sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Form, FormGroup, InputGroupAddon, InputGroupText, InputGroup, Label, Input, Col, Row } from 'reactstrap'; const DocInfo = (props) => (

Titile: {props.info.title}

Authors: {(props.info.authors.length > 4 ? props.info.authors.slice(0,3) : props.info.authors) + ' ...'}

Publish Time: {props.info.publishTime}

Abstract: {props .info .textAbstract .substring(0, 800) + '...'}

); export default DocInfo;
